data.persona: I am second to god. I have a halo. I have wings. My harp breaks eyes.
data.description:
You are in the waterfall.
Near the top of the mountain is a beautiful waterfall. It falls down many many feet to a beautiful lake. It is very loud and very majestic. It sparkles in the sun.
There's a pot of gold here.
The midget is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a wing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the midget so that the midget leads me to the pot of gold.
data.mid_motivation: I have been flying around in search of the fabled pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.
data.long_motivation: I have been ordered by god to find treasures to bring to heaven.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give pot of gold to god
